text: Across the globe,
security auditors who are trained
on cloud specific verification techniques
are in high demand.
Today, control framework language is catered
towards on-premises environments
and security IT auditing techniques
haven't been reshaped for the cloud.
Cloud Audit Academy,
CAA is an AWS security auditing learning path
designed for existing and prospective auditing,
risk, and compliance professionals who are involved
in taking compliance workloads to market.
On your journey, you'll start
with a wide cloud agnostic scope
that narrows as you progress to focus
on AWS, framework, and industry specific content.
The CAA Foundational Course educates you
on the difference between auditing
in the cloud versus on premises.
CAA AWS focuses on AWS specific audit considerations
and AWS best practices for security auditing.
From there, you'll have the option to specialize
in specific industry frameworks, such as
the payment card industry data security standard PCI DSS
or US federal government frameworks,
such as the NIST SP800 series
with new frameworks added to meet growing needs.
To supercharge your career
in organization with Cloud Audit Academy
and learn best practices to audit the security
of cloud workloads with AWS.
Visit www.aws.amazon.com/compliance/auditor-learning-path.
(upbeat music)
